name: css-text-align
description: Css module of single purpose classes for text align

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-text-align.css > css/css-text-align.css && tachyons src/css-text-align.css --minify > css/css-text-align.min.css && tachyons src/css-text-align.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
